Text:
I can't get this to work. The only files I see inside are file_id.diz, outlaws.nfo, and 13 zipped files from o-flt17a to o-flt17m. I can't find "FlotillaSetup_v13.exe" or "FlotillaPatch_v1_7.exe" that are found in the instructions.

What's wrong?
You're supposed to extract the zip files all into the same directory, and then extract the rar files in that directory. It's scene packed.
This doesn't work. It prompts for o-flt17.r00 on the second extraction, which is not present.

Sorry, this works. You have to select ALL zip files before extraction. This is dumb though, you could have compressed this in a more user-friendly way. A lot of people won't understand what you did there.

I got it to work. Thanks so much. Unzip, (or rar), the original files. Then unzip what just got unzipped. I know! Do all this in the same directory. Install...enjoy. The latest updates install perfectly from the developer's site. Pretty cool!
Why bother to upload torrents when you DON'T FUCKING SEED THEM?
